code: import axios from'axios';var apiEndpoint='https://api.johnlawrimore.com/store/products';var apiConfig={headers:{Authorization:'cmiller'}};export var getProductById=function getProductById(productId){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){axios.get("".concat(apiEndpoint,"/").concat(productId),apiConfig).then(function(x){return resolve(x.data);}).catch(function(x){alert(x);reject(x);});});};
